tooltip.testforgemod.ollivanders_wand.ex: Right click on air/water: Disarms all entities within a range of 10 blocks. Attack: Disarm target. (§4§lexpelliarmus!§r)
tooltip.testforgemod.ollivanders_wand.lu: Right click on block: Spawn a light block (§7§llumos!§r). Press §eShift§r to view secondary ability.
tooltip.testforgemod.phoenix_feather: Phoenix core, used to craft wands or cook food for an incredibly long time.
